text: @Mikel_Jollett From what info is coming out 16% result in severe illness, complications including pneumonia. 5% will develop respiratory failure, septic shock, organ failure. No one has immunity yet. People with Asthma, diabetes, heart disease are at higher risk. From https://t.co/rtQ9YNYv7y
